title: Delhi Duty Free Launches: Why Shop any Where else Campaign with Lowest Prices in the Region
text:
Company : Delhi Duty Free Services Pvt Ltd Wednesday, July 8, 2015 10:00AM IST (4:30AM GMT) Delhi Duty Free Launches: Why Shop any Where else Campaign with Lowest Prices in the Region New Delhi, Delhi, India 
It doesn’t matter where you’re travelling to , if you are travelling abroad from New Delhi , Delhi Duty Free at T3, Indira Gandhi International Airport is the best place for duty free shopping to get the best brands at the regions best prices with some great savings against downtown prices & international duty free prices. Delhi Duty Free is the largest, duty-free shop in India, with over 8,000 products from some of the finest brands from all over the world. The duty-free liquor, perfume & confectionery here has one of the widest ranges of international airports in India. Said Abhijit Das, Head of Marketing - Delhi Duty-free : “The “Why shop anywhere else campaign” is designed to assure our travelers of as price promise, great offers & a fantastic range of world class top brands as compared other duty-free shops. So customers travelling to middle-east, Singapore, Europe can now be assured of world’s best duty free brands in India at best prices.” The newly launched campaign promises best prices on many top brands as compared to duty-free shops in Singapore, Dubai & many other countries. On perfume & cosmetics Delhi Duty free is offering “Best Price Guarantee”, which promises to refund the difference to customer if any perfume or cosmetic product purchased at Delhi duty free is found to be cheaper in other international duty free shops. This is not all; following are other promotions at DDFS: Additional 5% Discount on Free shop & collect; wherein you can shop at departure & collect when you come back to India. Chance to win for a couple - Free all Paid trip to Switzerland on shopping of $100 or more At departure shops, get assured free shopping vouchers on shopping of just $ 150 or more. You can get free Duty-free shopping vouchers worth upto $ 60. Free Gifts on shopping like trolley bags. Upto 30% off on top selling perfumes Exclusive offers for travelers who have booked tickets with Makemytrip.com & Free Expandable bag on the purchase of coupons at Groupon.com. ​ For more details log on to: www.delhidutyfree.co.in or mail your queries to: support@delhidutyfree.co.in ABOUT DELHI DUTY FREE: The company Delhi Duty Free Services Pvt Ltd was awarded the concession to manage and operate the Duty Free Shops at Terminal 3, Indira Gandhi International Airport in Delhi. DDFS will be single largest duty free retail operator in India operating out of T3, the 6th largest single terminal building in terms of floor area. The Company has three shareholders namely: Delhi International Airport Private Limited , Yalorvin Limited , GMR Airports Limited .As India’s progressive economy continues to grow, DDFS sees an exciting opportunity within the airport retailing business ensuring Delhi Duty Free is established as one of the world’s prominent travel retail shopping experiences and destination.
